code: import axios from"axios";var URL="https://api.themoviedb.org/3";var API_KEY="28c5a5bb5ae830823097ffb31f8a685e";var endpoints={originals:"/discover/tv",trending:"/trending/all/week",popular:"movie/popular"};export var fetchData=function fetchData(param){return axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/popular?api_key=28c5a5bb5ae830823097ffb31f8a685e",{params:{append_to_response:"videos"}});};
